thread.title: new york new york
thread.title_full: new york new york - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah D
title: new york new york
text: we stayed here at the beginning of march and was very pleased with the hotel, we had 2 double beds in our room and were very comfortable to sleep in, a lovely hot shower each morning and that's all we needed really as we wernt in our room much as out exploring new York. we didn't use the gym or restaurant so cant comment on that, the lifts were always working and quite quick, we were on the 12th floor! there is a little shop by the lifts and the gentleman that worked there was friendly. the lobby is dark but wasn't a problem. Our rooms were cleaned every day which was nice but didn't always leave enough towels. when we checked in, there wasn't a room ready for us and we had to wait 30 minutes which wasn't great as we had been travelling for 18 hours and we just wanted to go to bed and the woman on reception dissapered for 10 mins without telling us what was going on so we had to ask the gentleman that was working there to find out where she was and what was happening.no apology from her for having to wait. overall we liked the hotel and would stay again if we had the same room
